= Introduction =

IL2 DCE proposals


= Details =
*Dan Antonescu*
- delayed take off/spawning for escort/intercept missions (only when the escorted airplanes reach a certain point - are in range/are detected and in range)
- in-flight spawning for escorted/intercepted missions (place them on their calculated reach point in their flight-path at the moment player's escort airplanes are spawned)
- dynamic kill confirmation (with chances of success depending if above friendly territory, if in certain distance from friendly aircrafts, friendly ground, etc)
- pilot aces
- kill tracks and characteristics advancement for all pilots (RPG system)
